item.description:
Coffee Talk invites you for an evening of coffee, other hot beverage and/or dinner
followed by a ride to New Haven Light House Fantasy of Lights.

This will be a combination December Monthly Meet Up
and December Holidays Meet Up.

The night shall start around 6 pm at

Village Inn Diner
699 Main Street
East Haven , CT 06512
(203) 469 5759

http://www.nearhome.c...

www.nearhome.com/needfoodnow/ct/eastshore/villiageinn/index.htm

Go to the link for a map and other information
For The Village Inn Diner.

It is next door to the McDonalds on Main Street.

To save on costs going to the Fantasy of Lights, we should fill up our
Vehicles with passengers at the Diner.
We can plan on who is going in what vehicle.

Then we can go down the street and hang a left to go to the
New Haven Light House Fantasy of Lights.

Lighthouse Point Park
2 Lighthouse Road
New Haven , CT 06512
(203) 946-8005

http://newhavengoodwi...

newhavengoodwill.easterseals.com/site/PageServer?pagename=CTNH_events

You have to turn your car radio channel to some
Local AM frequency to listen to the presentation and music.

If you cannot go to the Fantasy of Lights on this date with this Meet Up Group,
Then you are encouraged to go enjoy this event on your own before it closes
At the end of the year.

If there is any bad weather, such as snow, ice or very hard rain, then
Meet Ups will be automatically cancelled.
I do not want my members being injured for just coming to a Meet Up.

One time we had over 10 members attend a Village Green Meet Up.
We filled up three tables that night.
Lately Meet Ups have had been from none to 5 members in attendance.

Understandably some of you might be busy shopping for presents, working, spending
Time with family or working on other projects.
If you have some spare time, then you are more than welcome to come have a cup
of coffee with us.

Best Wishes
Happy Holidays.

Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my purple back pack with me in the restaurant.
item.name: Coffee Talk @ Coffee & Light House Fantasy of Lights on 12/12
